subject: Financial implications of agenda items placed before the executive committee.
text: Ecoeiit 9 Ten4 taArt 4iraentot TAN Phone 91-11-25074100/26074200 TRast am Iatrf #ATT) 7an Fax 91-11-25093507 25093814 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0-5 Va &, taat-10, Tna, . 78 fcvn-110075 6-6 & 6, Secton-1C, Dwerka New Delhk]10075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Financial Implication of Agenda Items/2017 No. 18.28/2017 Dated the 3rd November 2017 (Decision taken by Executive Committee in the meeting held on 05.10.2017 on Agenda Item No.319.23) Sub: Financial implications Of agenda items placed before the Executive Committee: As approved by the Executive Committee In its meeting on 05.10.2017 vide item Oo_ 319.23, in future all the agenda items to.the placed before the Executive Committee must include the following: (_) Financial Implications Direct; (ii) Financial Implications Indirect, in case the EC decides to approved the specific agenda iter) (A.K.Sadhu) Chief General Manager (Co-ordination To Ail Officers and Employees of HQV ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices: Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 319th
